Package org.dspace.core

Provides some basic functionality required throughout the DSpace system.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConfigurationManager Class for reading the DSpace system configuration.
Constants Class with constants and matching strings, for DSpace types.
Context Class representing the context of a particular DSpace operation.
Email Class representing an e-mail message, also used to send e-mails.
I18nUtil I18nUtil.java Some Utilities for i18n Support.
LogManager Class for generating standard log header
PluginManager The Plugin Manager is a very simple component container.
SelfNamedPlugin Simple lightweight "framework" for managing plugins.
Utils Utility functions for DSpace.
 

Exception Summary
PluginInstantiationException This exception indicates a fatal error when instantiating a plugin class.
 

Error Summary
PluginConfigurationError Indicates fatal error in Plugin Manager configuration.
 

Package org.dspace.core Description

Provides some basic functionality required throughout the DSpace system.
